title: When I start Solr with one collection, the CoreAdmin tab does not show up. If I start with 2 collections, it does.
description: Perhaps this was done for compatibility with the old single core mode? If you are doing multi core and only have a single solrcore, you still want access to CoreAdmin though.

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Mark that sounds like a Duplicate of SOLR-3401 ?
